TopicTitle: How do you add signatures? Also, why do my posts not show up?

Articles.Content: I'm new to the forums, and I need some help.

Well first off, since you are new, your first few posts have to be approved by a moderator, but after a day or so you'll be free to post as you wish. With the signature, go to your settings, and look on the left hand side, There is a toolbar there, with a bunch of options, such as "edit avatar" and "edit info" and just look for "edit Signature". You can type one in there. Hope this helps!

Welcome to the forums!

Yep, you need 5 posts until you can post without the getting approved by moderator thing, and I don't think you can edit your sig until 5 posts too.
